profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.5 Extended graphics state - Halftone type
profile.description: All halftones in a conforming PDF/A-2 file shall have the value 1 or 5 for the HalftoneType key.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium
